body_html:
Hello all @pkurogerjs @OdingdongO @aselle @atrah22 ,

I am facing the same problem with inference_type=FLOAT. However, the model i am trying is ssd_mobilenet_v1_coco. I had successfully trained the model on my custom data sets and is working fine.
But when porting to android it is throwing error related to

mismatched Tensor + input buffer size. The error reads as
8-16 10:26:42.107 28242 28257 E AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: inference
08-16 10:26:42.107 28242 28257 E AndroidRuntime: Process: org.tensorflow.lite.demo, PID: 28242
08-16 10:26:42.107 28242 28257 E AndroidRuntime: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot convert between a TensorFlowLite buffer with 1080000 bytes and a ByteBuffer with 270000 bytes.

where should I change the input size for the float inference. I would appreciate your pain if you could share any detailed steps (i am new to tensorflow and tflite).

Thank you for your time!

body:
Hello all @pkurogerjs @OdingdongO @aselle @atrah22 ,

I am facing the same problem with `inference_type=FLOAT`. However, the model i am trying is ssd_mobilenet_v1_coco. I had successfully trained the model on my custom data sets and is working fine.
But when porting to android it is throwing error related to  

> mismatched Tensor + input buffer size. The error reads as
8-16 10:26:42.107 28242 28257 E AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: inference
08-16 10:26:42.107 28242 28257 E AndroidRuntime: Process: org.tensorflow.lite.demo, PID: 28242
08-16 10:26:42.107 28242 28257 E AndroidRuntime: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot convert between a TensorFlowLite buffer with 1080000 bytes and a ByteBuffer with 270000 bytes.

where should I change the input size for the float inference. I would appreciate your pain if you could share any detailed steps (i am new to tensorflow and tflite).

Thank you for your time!
